snippet: Net income rose for the tech company, but sales were below Wall Street expectations.
abstract: IBM reports third-quarter net income was $4.04 billion, or $3.68 a share, up 6 percent from $3.82 billion, or $3.33 a share, in year-ago quarter; revenue fell 4 percent, to $23.72 billion from $24.75 billion.
lead_paragraph: Net income rose for the tech company, but sales were below Wall Street expectations.

headline.main: I.B.M.’s Sales Fall Far Short of Forecasts
headline.print_headline: I.B.M.’s Sales Fall Far Short Of Forecasts
